It is ID card drivers realized as an OpenSC PKCS!#15 emulator. OpenSC allows the usage of card readers (both with PINpad and without) through PC/SC, CT-API and OpenCT interfaces. PKCS!#15 emulator allows all OpenSC supporting applications to use the ID card.

The component allows to use all the ID card functions through the OpenSC interface:
 1. Read the user identification certificate
 1. Use the user identification key
 1. Read the signing certificate
 1. Use the signing certificate
 1. Change PINs
 1. Unblock PINs
